alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Collier, northern Mainland Monroe, northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 616 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dade-Collier Training Airport, or 28 miles east of Chokoloskee, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Loop Road Ee Center, Big Cypress National Preserve, Fortymile Bend, Dade-Collier Training Airport, Miccosukee Indian Reservation, Miccosukee Service Plaza, Everglades National Park and West Broward Rec. Area On Alligator Alley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe
